name: Staff Directory
query:
Select
    e.name as "Employee ID::150",
    e.employee_name as "Employee Name::150",
    e.gender as "Gender::80",
    e.designation as "Designation::170",
    e.user_id as "Email::190",
    e.cell_number as "Mobile No :: 100",
    e.ip_number as "Iphone/Line::100",
    e.branch as "Location/Branch::180",
    e.department as "Department::180",
    concat(e.division," / ",e.section) as "Division/Section::230"
From `tabEmployee` e, `tabUser` u
Where e.user_id = u.name and e.status = "Active"
order by e.employee_name asc
